title: Understanding Schizophrenia
text: Schizophrenia is a complex mental disorder that affects how a person thinks, feels, and behaves. It is characterized by a range of symptoms that can include delusions, hallucinations, disorganized thinking, and impaired functioning.

title: Symptoms of Schizophrenia
text: Common symptoms of schizophrenia include hallucinations, delusions, disorganized speech, and impaired cognitive ability. These symptoms can significantly impact a person's ability to function in daily life.
